config.script:
# Get all the parameters we need to save
	type_id			= self.view.params.type_id
	type_name		= self.getSibling("Type_Entry").props.text
	edit			= self.view.params.edit
	
	
	# Do some validation...make sure everything has been entered correctly
	
	namedQuery = "Weight_Q/DB_Scalar/Count_Type"
	parameters = {
		'type_name':		type_name
	}
	
	exists = system.db.runNamedQuery(system.project.getProjectName(), namedQuery, parameters)
	
	
	if exists > 0:
		CORE_P.Utils.errorPopup('A line type with that name already exists.') 
		return
			
	
	txId = system.db.beginTransaction(timeout=5000)

	try:
	
		if edit == False:
	
			namedQuery = "Weight_Q/DB_Insert/Insert_Type"
			parameters = {
				'type_name':		type_name
			}
			
		else:
		
			namedQuery = "Weight_Q/DB_Update/Update_Type"
			parameters = {
				'type_id':			type_id, 
				'type_name':		type_name,
			}
			
		affected_rows = system.db.runNamedQuery(system.project.getProjectName(), namedQuery, parameters,tx=txId)
		
		message =  'Added/Edited new packaging line type:' + str(parameters)
		
		# Audit log
		CORE_P.Utils.logChanges(self, 
                     'AddEditPackagingLineType',
                     message, 
                     txId=txId,
                    )
		system.db.commitTransaction(txId)
                        			
		# Update the table with lines 
		system.perspective.sendMessage("update_bindings", payload = {}, scope = "page")

		CORE_P.Utils.showSuccess(self, "Saved!") 
		
		system.perspective.closePopup('')

	except:
		system.db.rollbackTransaction(txId)
		CORE_P.Utils.errorPopup('Error adding/editing Packaging Line Type:') #  + str(sys.exc_info())

# Get all the parameters we need to delete
	
	type_id 		= self.view.params.type_id

	txId = system.db.beginTransaction(timeout=5000)

	try:

		namedQuery = "Weight_Q/DB_Delete/Delete_Type"
		parameters = {
			'type_id':			type_id
		}
			

		affected_rows = system.db.runNamedQuery(system.project.getProjectName(), namedQuery, parameters,tx=txId)
		
		message =  'Deleted packaging line type:' + str(parameters)
		
		# Audit log
		CORE_P.Utils.logChanges(self, 
                     'DeletePackagingLineType',
                     message, 
                     txId=txId,
                    )
		system.db.commitTransaction(txId)
                        			
		# Update the table with lines 
		system.perspective.sendMessage("update_bindings", payload = {}, scope = "page")

		CORE_P.Utils.showSuccess(self, "Deleted!") 
		
		self.props.value=0
		
		system.perspective.closePopup('')

	except:
		system.db.rollbackTransaction(txId)
		self.props.value=0
		CORE_P.Utils.errorPopup('Error deleting Packaging Line Type:') #  + str(sys.exc_info())
